rules.name: Escalation_Obtain_Service_Approval
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8) AND 9
rules.label: Escalation Obtain Service Approval

rules.name: Other_Escalation_Process
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8) AND 9
rules.label: Other Escalation Process

rules.name: Is_Auto_Obtain_Cust_Info_Esc
rules.label: Is Auto Obtain Cust Info Esc

rules.name: Escalation_Obtain_Cust_Info
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8)
rules.label: Escalation Obtain Cust Info

Flow.description: This flow creates Escalation task and assigns to Default User update 7/16 3:02 pm EST Last Modified : Anu

formulas.description: This formula is to check if multi case id is blank or not
formulas.name: CheckMultiCaseId

formulas.description: To populate profile number if populated
formulas.name: CheckProfileNumber

formulas.description: To populate Description from Task for Escalation Obtain Customer Info Task
formulas.name: EscalationObtainCustomerinfo

formulas.description: Assign Account Id when Process contains Service Guarantees
formulas.name: VarAccountId

formulas.description: Null check due date time delay field which comes from meta data
formulas.name: varDueDateTimeDelayCheck

formulas.description: Check whether Business Rule has the Process or not.
formulas.name: VarProcessCheck
formulas.expression: IF({!varProcess} == 'Escalation Rejected Work Order' && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Escalation Rejected Work Order"),true, IF({!varProcess} == {!CustomerServiceGuaranteesConst} && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Set Customer's Service Guarantees"),true, IF({!varProcess} == {!ServiceGuaranteesConst} && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Service Guarantees Approval"),true, IF({!varProcess} == 'Validate Email Approval Response' && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Validate Email Approval Response"),true, IF({!varProcess} == 'Escalation Obtain Customer Info' && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Escalation Obtain Customer Info"),true, IF({!varProcess} == 'Escalation Obtain Service Approval' && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Escalation Obtain Service Approval"),true, IF({!varProcess} == 'Escalation Emergency Case' && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Escalation Emergency Case"),true, IF({!varProcess} == 'Escalation Confirm Vendor Availability' && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Escalation Confirm Vendor Availability"),true, IF({!varProcess} == 'Escalation Confirm Service Completion' && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Escalation Confirm Service Completion"),true, IF({!varProcess} == 'Escalation Obtain Vendor Information' && INCLUDES( {!VarBusinessRuleProcess}, "Escalation Obtain Vendor Information"),True,False))))))))))

Flow.label: Process to create Escalation Task
